text: UDâwûd (engalibazisanga) wathi: “Ukonile ngokufuna imvu yakho ukuba ayongeze kwezakhe. Kambe maninzi amahlulelane acinezelanayo, ngaphandle kwabo bakholwayo, benze izenzo ezilungileyo yaye bambalwa.” Ke kaloku uDâwûd waqikelela okokuba beSimvavanya wacela itarhu eNkosini yakhe, wawa phantsi waqubuda wabuyela kuAllâh ngenguquko
